set-payload.value: { "brand": "Anypoint", "identifier": "cd67cd8a-8901-48c5-890b-0a21f4a0f8ad", "model": "Men's Chino Jogger Pants", "rating": 5, "description": "100% Cotton. No stretch. Lightweight fabric. Regular fit jogger pants, slightly tapered legs with elasticized cuffs. Sits at the waist. Elastic closure. Comfortable elastic waist with drawstring. No zip. 2 front slant pockets, 1 back patch pocket. Pre-washed, will not shrink. Very comfortable and stylish for year round wear. Cold hand/machine wash.", "pictures": [ "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61hUUA%2BaEQL._UX342_.jpg", "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61Ezqhc-8AL._UX342_.jpg", "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/718HJuJXwSL._UX342_.jpg" ], "price": { "amount": { "currency": "USD", "currencyValue": 47.95, "name": "Amount" }, "salesUnit": { "code": "EA", "name": "Each" } } }
